original_title: Juana la Iguana: Aventuras y Pinturas
overview: When Juana la Iguana discovers that the colors from her all-time favorite painting are missing, she gathers her sleuthing hat and some young detectives for an exciting musical adventure! Featured tunes in this Spanish-language sing-along include "Payasito," "Quiero Ser Artista," "El Barco Mágico," "El Sebucán de Juana," "El Perro del Cerro," "Tres Ratones Van," "El Perro de Mi Patio" and "Tema de Despedida."
title: Juana la Iguana: Aventuras y Pinturas
